import axios from'axios';import getCookie from'./getCookie';const cookieName=process.env.REACT_APP_COOKIE_NAME;const apiVersion=process.env.REACT_APP_API_VERSION;const baseURL="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL,"/").concat(apiVersion);const instance=axios.create({baseURL:baseURL// withCredentials:true
});export const frontEndInstance=axios.create({withCredentials:true});instance.interceptors.request.use(requestSuccess,requestError);frontEndInstance.interceptors.request.use(requestSuccess,requestError);function requestSuccess(config){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(getCookie(cookieName));return config;}function requestError(error){return Promise.reject(error);}instance.interceptors.response.use(responseSuccess,responseError);frontEndInstance.interceptors.request.use(responseSuccess,responseError);function responseSuccess(response){return response;}function responseError(error){return Promise.reject(error);}export default instance;
